A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie wasn't as good as TFA\, by not answering the questions about Reys parentage\, or why she's so strong with the force leaves a bad taste. Also all powerful snoke is killed to easily. Leia doing a superman. Luke is completely wasted. Finn and Rose waste of screen time. Too many holes in plot. Just a disaster. Not sure how critics can rate it so highly. JJ Abrams should've directed this for continuity sake.
